name: BlueNoiseforSleep,Relaxation,andFocus
0:
”Alexa open blue noise”
”Alexa ask blue noise to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: blue noise
des:
Blue Noise is a proven and effective way to block out distractions and fall asleep easy. As a higher frequency sound than White noise, Blue Noise can provide the background you just might be looking for. 

All you need to do is say Alexa start Blue Noise for Sleep, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to leave on while you are asleep, to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
